Articles.Content:
1.0 is installed, and I am having fun, but I find I am missing a few mods more than others:

Kerbal Alarm Clock (isn't working for me thus far)

Chatterer (I had hoped this mod was being incorporated into the game)

TAC LS (I love life support)

Remote Tech

Precise Node

Kerbal Construction Time (I actually enjoy it more when everything isn't instantaneous)

Squad \*did\* do a beautiful job. Here's to many more hundreds of hours in space. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Yep, this is exactly why I can't get too into 1.0 yet.
Give it time. It always takes a week or so for most mods to update
